mapper.sql: select FIHF_id, Year_And_Month, Total_Sales_Revenue, External_Group_Sales_Revenue, Total_Vehicle_Production, Total_Vehicle_Sales, New_Product_Sales_Revenue, Specialty_Product_Revenue, Total_Sales_Cost, Manufacturing_Expenses_Month, Reserve_Car_Amount, Capital_Turnover_Rate, Inventory_Turnover_Rate, Raw_Material_Turnover_Rate, InProgress_Turnover_Rate, Long_Estimated_Items, InProgress_DayRevenue, Added_Value_Monthly, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table
mapper.select: select * from ( select Year_And_Month from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table order by Year_And_Month DESC ) as t order by Year_And_Month ASC
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table WHERE Year_And_Month=#{yearAndMonth})

SELECT MAX(FIHF_id) fihfId, MAX(Year_And_Month) yearAndMonth, sum(Total_Sales_Revenue) totalSalesRevenue, sum(External_Group_Sales_Revenue) externalGroupSalesRevenue, sum(Total_Vehicle_Production) totalVehicleProduction, sum(Total_Vehicle_Sales) totalVehicleSales, sum(New_Product_Sales_Revenue) newProductSalesRevenue, sum(Specialty_Product_Revenue) specialtyProductRevenue, sum(Total_Sales_Cost) totalSalesCost, sum(Manufacturing_Expenses_Month) manufacturingExpensesMonth, sum(Reserve_Car_Amount) reserveCarAmount, sum(Capital_Turnover_Rate) capitalTurnoverRate, sum(Inventory_Turnover_Rate) inventoryTurnoverRate, sum(Raw_Material_Turnover_Rate) rawMaterialTurnoverRate, sum(InProgress_Turnover_Rate) inprogressTurnoverRate, sum(Long_Estimated_Items) longEstimatedItems, sum(InProgress_DayRevenue) inprogressDayrevenue, sum(Added_Value_Monthly) addedValueMonthly FROM Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table WHERE date_format(Year_And_Month,'%Y') = date_format(#{yearAndMonth},'%Y')

SELECT FIHF_id fihfId, Year_And_Month yearAndMonth, Capital_Turnover_Rate capitalTurnoverRate, Inventory_Turnover_Rate inventoryTurnoverRate, Raw_Material_Turnover_Rate rawMaterialTurnoverRate, InProgress_Turnover_Rate inprogressTurnoverRate FROM Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table WHERE Year_And_Month IN ( SELECT MAX(Year_And_Month) FROM Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table WHERE YEAR(Year_And_Month) = YEAR(#{yearAndMonth}) and Inventory_Turnover_Rate is not null )
mapper.insert:
insert into Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table
FIHF_id, Year_And_Month, Total_Sales_Revenue, External_Group_Sales_Revenue, Total_Vehicle_Production, Total_Vehicle_Sales, New_Product_Sales_Revenue, Specialty_Product_Revenue, Total_Sales_Cost, Manufacturing_Expenses_Month, Reserve_Car_Amount, Capital_Turnover_Rate, Inventory_Turnover_Rate, Raw_Material_Turnover_Rate, InProgress_Turnover_Rate, Long_Estimated_Items, InProgress_DayRevenue, Added_Value_Monthly, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME,
#{fihfId}, #{yearAndMonth}, #{totalSalesRevenue}, #{externalGroupSalesRevenue}, #{totalVehicleProduction}, #{totalVehicleSales}, #{newProductSalesRevenue}, #{specialtyProductRevenue}, #{totalSalesCost}, #{manufacturingExpensesMonth}, #{reserveCarAmount}, #{capitalTurnoverRate}, #{inventoryTurnoverRate}, #{rawMaterialTurnoverRate}, #{inprogressTurnoverRate}, #{longEstimatedItems}, #{inprogressDayrevenue}, #{addedValueMonthly}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from Financial_Indicators_HandFill_table where FIHF_id in
#{fihfId}
